attributes.action: Force all builders to use solar tiles in the building of new homes/commercial premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would improve the amount of green energy produced, possibly even allowing the property owner to sell any excess to the electricity companies.  It would also, in the longer run, reduce the cost of solar tiles so that existing buildings being updated or extended could obtain the solar tiles more cost effectively.
